content:
the digital managing editor performs a variety of roles and generally serves as counsel to the Emerald newsroom PERIOD To be more specific the digital managing editor works closely with the photo video podcast and social media desks edits cover stories and is a visionary thinker who works alongside other editors to improve the Emeralds digital presence PERIOD A digital managing editor must hold themselves to high ethical and editorial standards and have a solid understanding of how the Emerald operates PERIOD This position is a serious time commitment that requires devotion to the newsroom Coordinating and scheduling digital components of cover stories PERIOD This includes attending cover pitch meetings working with writers across desks and coordinating with the writer photographer videographer and designer to create a cohesive cover story PERIOD

Responsibilities include

 Overseeing digital production timelines and manage a team of designers and editors PERIOD

 Working with the EiC to decide what goes into the Emeralds digital editions PERIOD Edit stories for Search Engine Optimization and give editors and writers feedback to help them improve SEO practices PERIOD

 Managing and improving the DailyE newsletter and the Emeralds website PERIOD

 Responsible for website curation including making sure content is fresh and rotates regularly while functioning properly PERIOD

 Managing projects across multimedia desks and facilitates crossdesk collaboration PERIOD

 Providing advice and offer insight to reporters and editors when ethical issues arise PERIOD

 Ensuring that the Emerald meets content quotas and monitor quality PERIOD Meet with desk editors and the EiC to talk about solutions when that isnt the case PERIOD

The Daily Emerald is the news division of Emerald Media Group University of Oregons independent student media organization PERIOD

EDITOR in CHIEF
Evan Reynolds541  Ext PERIOD
